name: Constellar Constant
text: All monsters on your side of the field are LIGHT-Type. If you activate a "tellar" Xyz monster effect; Special Summon 1 "tellar" monster from your GY. You can target 2 "tellar" monsters on the field and declare a level from 1-8; those monsters become that level. Your opponent cannot respond to the effects of "tellar" Xyz monsters. You can only use each effect of "Constellar Constant" once per turn.
